title: Warehouse District Solar â€” 1 MW
summary: A megawatt-scale industrial installation spanning multiple warehouse rooftops in Phoenix's logistics district.
description: This flagship project for Phoenix Logistics Co. installed 1 megawatt of solar capacity across their warehouse complex. The installation includes both rooftop and carport arrays, providing shade for employee parking while generating clean power.
highlights: 1 MW total capacity across multiple buildings
Carbon offset equivalent to 1,500 cars annually

testimonial.quote: This project has transformed our operations. Not only are we saving significantly on energy costs, but our employees love the shaded parking. Third Fuse Energy handled everything professionally.
testimonial.author: Robert Chen
